channel.title: [508]How I make NPC's aggressive(whoever tells answer=ill tell how to d claws 4x
channel.description:
Okay how do I make a 508 NPC aggressive here are the codes(whoever tells me the answer I'll tell you how to get dragon claws special to hit 4x each)
[code]npc = 6203 650 255 49 2 1 90 6945 6944 6946 7 K'ril Tsutsaroth A_servant_of_the_god_Zamorak.[/code]
[code]spawn = 6203 2930 5325 2 2935 5330 2919 3519 K'ril Tsutsaroth[/code]
